user_story.i_want: to browse restaurants by different cuisine types
user_story.so_that: I can easily find food options that match my taste preferences
acceptance_criteria: The app displays a list of available cuisines.
Users can filter restaurants by cuisine type, such as Italian, Chinese, and Mexican.
Users can sort restaurants by rating, distance, or average delivery time.

user_story.i_want: to place orders with custom instructions
user_story.so_that: I can tailor my meal to my exact liking
acceptance_criteria: Users can input special instructions for each item before placing an order.
There is a character limit of 250 for special instructions.
The app displays an error message if instructions are too vague or inappropriate.

user_story.i_want: to track my food delivery in real-time
user_story.so_that: I can know exactly when to expect my order
acceptance_criteria: The app provides a live tracking map showing the delivery path.
Users receive notifications for any delays or cancellations of their orders.
If the order is delivered, the status updates to 'Delivered' with a timestamp.
If the tracking is unavailable, users receive a notification explaining the issue.

user_story.so_that: I can provide feedback and help improve services
acceptance_criteria: The app allows users to give a rating on a scale of 1 to 5 after receiving their order.
Users are prompted for a review after rating, with guidelines displayed for compliance.
Review guidelines appear in a pop-up after submitting a rating, detailing acceptable content.
Users are only prompted for a review once per order.

user_story.so_that: I can share my experiences with other users
acceptance_criteria: Users can navigate to a restaurant's page after an order is completed.
An option to leave a review is clearly visible on the restaurant's page.
Users must be logged in to leave a review to ensure accountability.

user_story.i_want: to save my favorite restaurants for quick reordering
user_story.so_that: I can easily access my go-to food options
acceptance_criteria: Users can mark a restaurant as a favorite through a dedicated button.
A favorites section is available on the main menu to quickly view saved restaurants.
If a user tries to save a restaurant without being logged in, the app prompts them to log in or create an account.
